name: Who Kill Wait Egg? (ใคร ฆ่า รอ ไข่?)
name_original: Who Kill Wait Egg? (ใคร ฆ่า รอ ไข่?)
description:
"Lek" returns to elementary school to perform a ritual in which he converses with his brother's spirit. But then he came across something unexpected.

"Deep deep down to the hole
 Eternally death man persue
 Awake man chop their breath and soul
 Deceased will come and never go"

Something has gone wrong. Something that will bind him to the chains of the past and will bury him alive in the world of the dead. Find the answer before it's too late.

(The game's story is entirely made up for entertainment purposes.)
